channel.title: Client freezing? PLEASE HELP
channel.description:
Sometimes in the wild my client freezes and this comes up.
[code]Exception in thread "Thread-4" java.lang.NullPointerException at client.method105(client.java:9957) at client.method36(client.java:2025) at client.method102(client.java:9371) at client.method9(client.java:10636) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:143) at client.run(client.java:259) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)[/code]
Could anyone tell me what it means or how to fix? i suspect its a gfx error but im not sure.

item.title: Client freezing? PLEASE HELP
item.dc:creator: @glestrts glestrts
item.description:
@glestrts wrote:

[quote=“Chemist, post:1, topic:337557”]Sometimes in the wild my client freezes and this comes up.

Exception in thread "Thread-4" java.lang.NullPointerException at client.method105(client.java:9957) at client.method36(client.java:2025) at client.method102(client.java:9371) at client.method9(client.java:10636) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:143) at client.run(client.java:259) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

Could anyone tell me what it means or how to fix? i suspect its a gfx error but im not sure.[/quote]
if its in the wildiy and only in some places then its most likely an error with either your multi-sign (in bottom left), or an invalid model. try extending your multi boolean and tell me if it freezes in new places.

Read full topic
